headline: Is Now the Right Moment for Micron After White House Backs Away From Taking a Stake?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Micron Technology stock? You are not alone. Investors have been buzzing about MU, weighing its impressive returns against its rapid swings. In just the past year, Micron has climbed nearly 15% and is up a staggering 35% year-to-date. If you stretch out to three and five years, the gains only look more dramatic, with increases of over 100% and 160% respectively. That is not just luck or riding a wave; it represents resilient growth in a highly competitive...

headline: Citi Keeps Buy, $150 Target on Micron (MU) as AI Tailwinds Build
summary: Micron Technology Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the best data center stocks to buy now. Micron’s stock has surged 47% since the start of the year, and the momentum doesn’t look like it’s stopping any time soon. Supporting this view, Citi analyst Christopher Danely reiterated his Buy rating on August 20 and maintained a price target […]

headline: Micron (MU) Stock in Focus: AI Demand Fuels $150 Price Target
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the Must-Watch AI Stocks for Investors. One of the biggest analyst calls on Wednesday, August 20, was for Micron. Citi reiterated the stock as “Buy” with a $150 price target. The firm said that it’s standing by the semis company. The optimism on Micron stems from anticipated rise in profits […]
